title: France's Macron struggles for love at home
text:
France's Macron struggles for love at home 1:37am IST - 02:03 
French President Emmanuel Macron campaigned on being ''neither of the left, nor the right.'' But as faces down protests over his welfare and labor reforms, the young leader is finding that governing without a traditional power base has its price.   
French President Emmanuel Macron campaigned on being "neither of the left, nor the right." But as faces down protests over his welfare and labor reforms, the young leader is finding that governing without a traditional power base has its price.  //reut.rs/2phyZdY
